word_mean: 黄化现象，萎黄现象：植物生长在暗处，由于缺乏叶绿素而变苍白
皮肤因缺乏阳光照射而变苍白

sentence.Network_en: Inhibition of chlorophyll synthesis may be caused by etiolation, mutant blocks, or streptomycin.
sentence.Network_cn: 叶绿素合成可以由黄化 、 突变性阻塞或链霉素而引起.

sentence.Network_en: His etiolation signaled years in prison.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的苍白皮肤表明他在狱中待了多年.

sentence.Network_en: Etiolation The type of growth exhibited by plants grown in darkness, usually from seed.
sentence.Network_cn: 黄化:是植物在黑暗中生长(通常从种子开始)所表现出来的生长类型.

means.word_mean: 2. the act of weakening by stunting the growth or development of something;
3. (botany) the act of causing a plant to develop without chlorophyll by growing it without exposure to sunlight;
